books.author: by George W. Bush
books.description: Sixty-six color paintings and a four-panel mural, accompanied by brief biographies, show members of the military who have served since 9/11. By the former president.
books.name: PORTRAITS OF COURAGE

books.author: by Margot Lee Shetterly
books.description: The story of the black women mathematicians at then-segregated NASA and its precursor. The basis of the movie.
books.name: HIDDEN FIGURES

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood in the Rust Belt.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the final years of World War II.
books.name: KILLING THE RISING SUN

books.author: by H. R. McMaster
books.description: This book by the newly appointed national security adviser, originally published in 1997, argues that officers of the Joint Chiefs of Staff failed to give President Johnson candid advice about the Vietnam War.
books.name: DERELICTION OF DUTY

books.author: by Diane Ackerman
books.description: How a Warsaw couple sheltered Jews and members of the Resistance during World War II. Originally published in 2007.
books.name: THE ZOOKEEPER’S WIFE

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by the Dalai Lama and Desmond Tutu with Douglas Abrams
books.description: A discussion between two spiritual leaders about how to find joy in the face of suffering.
books.name: THE BOOK OF JOY

books.author: by Chip Gaines and Joanna Gaines with Mark Dagostino
books.description: The couple who star in the HGTV show “Fixer Upper.”
books.name: THE MAGNOLIA STORY

books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR

books.author: by Saroo Brierley
books.description: The movie tie-in edition of "A Long Way Home," published in 2014, the story of how the author was lost on a train in India at age 5, adopted by an Australian couple and eventually found his birth family.
books.name: LION

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: A provocative look into the future by the author of “Sapiens.”
books.name: HOMO DEUS

books.author: by David Horowitz
books.description: A battle plan for the Trump White House.
books.name: BIG AGENDA

books.author: by Rory Feek
books.description: The songwriter describes his difficult childhood, love for his wife, and her death from cancer in 2016.
books.name: THIS LIFE I LIVE

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary. Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Broadway musical.
books.name: ALEXANDER HAMILTON
